review: Matches or exceeds my current experiences with Roku and other media players. I use it primarily for viewing media.Pros:App interfaces are well designed and intuitive, and the included controller is both comfortable and easy to use. No issues with dropping wireless connections that I've encountered with similar devices. Price is very reasonable.Cons:Stick has a required secondary power adapter that somewhat limits where it can be reasonably attached to a TV. It comes with an HDMI extension for harder to reach locations, but it won't afford you more then a few inches. Combined with the power adapter, this could limit where you can practically install it, though I didn't encounter any significant issues. The auto resolution feature caused significant playback issues jumping between various settings on my setup before I selected one manually.
